Episodes.Title: Wait for It
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted's still not ready to date months after his breakup with Robin. But when Robin returns to New York with an exotic new boyfriend, he decides it's time to finally do something adventurous.

Episodes.Title: We're Not from Here
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Barney pose as tourists to pick up on a couple of New York women, and Robin starts getting fed up with her new boyfriend.

Episodes.Title: Third Wheel
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, David Hemingson
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted has a chance for a threesome with two women, but Barney and Lily try to sabotage it. Meanwhile, Robin's date also goes better than expected, if only she can find a razor.

Episodes.Title: Little Boys
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Robin tries to date a guy with a child, even though she does not like or want children. Meanwhile, Ted finds it impossible to make it with a woman he knows that Barney slept with a year ago.

Episodes.Title: How I Met Everyone Else
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While everyone meets Ted's crazy new girlfriend, everyone recounts their stories of how they met everyone else--but the stories turn out to have several inconsistencies.

Episodes.Title: I'm Not That Guy
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jonathan Groff
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted discovers that a porn star is using his name. Marshall is wined and dined by a firm that defends polluters, and Lily's spending habits may force him to take the job.

Episodes.Title: Dowisetrepla
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Brenda Hsueh
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall and Lily decide to buy a new home, which forces Lily to finally confront Marshall about her credit card debt.

Episodes.Title: Spoiler Alert
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The guys shatter Ted's impressions of his new girlfriend by telling him she talks too much. Ted responds by turning the tables on his friends, and they react by pointing out Ted's worst flaw.

Episodes.Title: Slapsgiving
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Matt Kuhn
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall warns Barney that the third slap in their "slap bet" will be coming on Thanksgiving night. Meanwhile, Ted and Robin sleep together on the night before Thanksgiving.

Episodes.Title: The Yips
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney has trouble hitting on women at the Victoria's Secret after party and so has to return to the woman who took his virginity.

Episodes.Title: The Platinum Rule
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney and the gang try to convince Ted not to date the doctor that is removing his tattoo by giving examples of the Platinum Rule.

Episodes.Title: No Tomorrow
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: On St-Patrick's Day, Ted follows Barney to a bar to party like there's no tomorrow, while Robin discovers something strange about Marshall and Lily's new apartment.

Episodes.Title: Ten Sessions
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: As the search for Mrs. Right continues, Ted woos his dermatologist Stella -- but her receptionist, Abby, seems more interested in him.

Episodes.Title: The Bracket
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: One of Barney's exes is sabotaging his love life, but he doesn't know who. So he makes a NCAA Basketball Tournament-style bracket to figure out which women he wronged the worst.

Episodes.Title: The Chain of Screaming
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall cries in front of his boss after he chews him out, and everybody gives Marshall their own unique advice on how to confront his boss about the situation.

Episodes.Title: Sandcastles in the Sand
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Robin gives romance a second try with an old boyfriend, only to have him break her heart...again.

Episodes.Title: The Goat
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney is upset because he violated his own "bro code" by sleeping with Robin. How will Ted react when he learns that Barney slept with his ex-girlfriend?

Episodes.Title: Rebound Bro
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney finds a new wingman to replace Ted, but he's painfully shy and awkward around women. Meanwhile Ted discovers that his new girlfriend Stella hasn't had sex in 5 years.

Episodes.Title: Everything Must Go
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jonathan Groff
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney helps Abby get back at Ted by staging a fake proposal, but Abby doesn't realize that it's fake. Lily decides to sell some of her paintings so that she and Marshall can pay for floor repairs at their new place.

Episodes.Title: Miracles
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted breaks up with Stella but immediately wants to take it back after a life-changing experience. However, Stella doesn't realize that he broke up with her. Meanwhile, Barney has a serious accident on his way to see Ted in the hos...
